title: U.S. Power Outages ML Analysis
description: Machine learning analysis of U.S. power outage data using Python, pandas, and scikit-learn. Performed EDA, missing value imputation, and regression-based prediction to identify factors affecting outage duration.

title: Immigration Policy & Urban Productivity
description: Data analysis project investigating correlations between immigration policy and urban productivity using LinkedIn geospatial data and statistical modeling techniques.

title: Fraud Detection System
description: Built automated fraud detection system using feature engineering and machine learning algorithms, reducing annual fraud loss by $10M for financial services platform.

title: Loan Performance Dashboard
description: Created real-time performance dashboards integrating macroeconomic and interest rates data, eliminating weekly leadership meetings and enabling data-driven decisions.

title: Predictive Credit Scoring Model
description: Developed ML model to improve credit scoring accuracy, increasing K-S discrimination by 39% and AUROC to 0.78, resulting in 146.6% more approvals with 3% fewer defaults.

title: Blockchain Document Certification
description: Conducted data analysis and benchmarking for blockchain-based document certification project, contributing to white paper that guided $18M+ fundraising efforts.

title: Structured Finance Analytics
description: Designed AWS and Google Cloud data warehouse for due diligence on terabytes of loan data, reducing costs by 10-30% and increasing operational efficiency by 30%.

title: Venture Capital Investment Analysis
description: Led end-to-end investment process for Series A-B deals in fintech and enterprise software, sourcing 100+ startups and closing $80M in co-investments.

title: Automated Loan Processing
description: Built automated loan processing systems using BigQuery and Zapier, driving 4x YoY sales growth and managing over $700M+ in consumer loan facilities.

title: Data Visualization Portfolio
description: Collection of interactive data visualizations created using D3.js, Tableau, and Python, showcasing various datasets and analytical insights.

title: Statistical Analysis Toolkit
description: Developed comprehensive statistical analysis toolkit using R and Python for exploratory data analysis, hypothesis testing, and regression modeling.

title: Database Design Project
description: Designed and implemented relational database system for managing large-scale data operations, optimizing query performance and data integrity.
